chunk.text: Hello all my name is Krishna Aayak and welcome to my youtube channel

chunk.text: In my previous video we saw basic terminology of NLP

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Which is called corpus, documents, vocabulary and words

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: We call corpus as paragraph and documents as sentences

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Vocabulary as unique number of words in the dictionary and words as a specific word

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Now what is tokenization process?

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Always remember this and tokenization is very important

chunk.text: So let's first of all see the definition of stemming and then we will move on to practical implementation.

chunk.title: Tutorial 4- Stemming And Lemmatization And Its Implementation NLP_Krish NAik(1)
chunk.text: So stemming is the process of reducing a word to its word stem.

chunk.title: Tutorial 4- Stemming And Lemmatization And Its Implementation NLP_Krish NAik(1)

chunk.title: Tutorial 4- Stemming And Lemmatization And Its Implementation NLP_Krish NAik(1)

chunk.title: Tutorial 4- Stemming And Lemmatization And Its Implementation NLP_Krish NAik(1)
chunk.text: So stemming is the process of reducing a word to its word stem that affixes to suffixes and prefixes or to the roots of the word known as lemma.

chunk.title: Tutorial 4- Stemming And Lemmatization And Its Implementation NLP_Krish NAik(1)
chunk.text: Stemming is important in natural language understanding and even it is used in natural language processing.
